NodeIsSameNode.summary:
The isSameNode() method of the interface
is a legacy alias the for the === strict equality operator.
That is, it tests whether two nodes are the same
(in other words, whether they reference the same object).

blockquote.para: Note: There is no need to use isSameNode(); instead use the === strict equality operator.

NodeIsSameNode.returns: A boolean value that is true if both nodes are strictly equal, false if not.
